title: Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: NOTE:/REMAINDER-MAC.EBONY; inscribed in graphite at center: SHELVES WHITE SYCAMORE; inscribed in graphite at lower left: 6; inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; inscribed dimensions
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for small shelving unit in white sycamore and macassar ebony; square shape with angular edges. Two shelves in white sycamore with open left side; remaining surfaces in macassar ebony. Table on two low, rectangular feet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Shelving Unit", ca. 1929–30.
ca. 1929–30. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-871.
